sentences.sContent: We also have music room and art rooms in the building.
sentences.sContent_eng: We also have music room and art rooms in the building.
sentences.sCn: 我们还有音乐教室和美术教室哦。

sentences.sContent: We played all sorts of games. In the music room we sang our first songs.
sentences.sContent_eng: We played all sorts of games. In the music room we sang our first songs.
sentences.sCn: 我们玩转了各式的游戏，在音乐教室里唱起了第一首歌，还第一次感触了文学的魅力。
